description: I tried to open the application multiple times didn't even give me an error
click on it after install and does nothing.
App won't even launch for me. I'll stick with Retroarch
wont open. garbage waste of tune
Doesnt open Doesnt open Doesnt open

A very simple and easy approach to using Libretro cores. I would ask that a few more of the basic configuration options were present by default. Other than that this is spot on and if you're device is setup correctly you should have no problem using this.
summary: I don't understand the bad reviews here. It's great

description: Por alguna razón no se ejecuta cuando lo quiero iniciar, y tampoco me da algún mensaje de error.
no sale nada aver si lo solucioan
Esta aplicacion no abre para nada, se veia excelente
